EmailTemplate.name: UNUSED - Loan Withdrawn / Declined Alert
EmailTemplate.subject: * Loan Withdrawn or Declined - Please Take Action *
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The status of {!LLC_BI__Loan__c.Name} has been changed to {!LLC_BI__Loan__c.LLC_BI__Status__c} for account {!LLC_BI__Loan__c.LLC_BI__Account__c}. Please take the appropriate actions where necessary.
